mapper.insert: insert into t_member(member_id, m_password, m_name, nick, tel, birth, email, gender) values(#{memberId}, #{password}, #{name}, #{nick}, #{tel}, to_date(replace(#{birth}, '-', ''),'yyyymmdd'), #{email}, #{gender})
mapper.select: select member_id as memberId, m_name as name, nick, to_char(birth ,'yyyy-mm-dd') as birth, email, tel, gender, img_path as imgPath, status from t_member where member_id=#{value}

select member_id as memberId, m_password as password, m_name as name, nick, to_char(birth ,'yyyy-mm-dd') as birth, email, tel, gender, img_path as imgPath, status from t_member where member_id=#{value}
select member_id, authority from t_authorities where member_id=#{value}
mapper.update: update t_member set nick=#{nick}, img_path=#{imgPath} where member_id=#{memberId}
